item.title: Barchan Dunes interacting with Obstacles
item.description: Here is the project report for the Project on Barchan Dunes that I carried out under the SRFP (Summer Research Fellowship Program) of the Indian Academy of Sciences, in the Summer of 2024. Previous Next     / [pdf] View the PDF file here.
